# LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.forClass(_:)

**Case**

The bundle for a specific class.

## Declaration

```swift
case forClass(AnyClass)
```

## Parameters

- **forClass**: The class associated with the bundle.

## Bundle descriptions

- **LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.main**: The app’s main bundle.
- **LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.atURL(_:)**: A bundle located at a specific file URL.

items.description: A bundle located at a specific file URL.
items.name: LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.atURL(_:)
